H0.text: What Family Guy character moved from Quahog, Rhode Island to Stoolbend, Virginia to spin off his own show. Glenn Quagmire

H1.text: What Family Guy character moved from Quahog, Rhode Island to Stoolbend, Virginia to spin off his own show. Joe Swanson

H2.text: What Family Guy character moved from Quahog, Rhode Island to Stoolbend, Virginia to spin off his own show. Cleveland Brown's Neighbor

H3.text: What Family Guy character moved from Quahog, Rhode Island to Stoolbend, Virginia to spin off his own show. Brown Family

A4.text: MacFarlane centered the show on Family Guy character Cleveland Brown and created new characters for Cleveland's family members.

A5.text: Following the series cancellation, it was confirmed by Seth MacFarlane that Cleveland would be moving back to Quahog with the rest of the Brown-Tubbs family to rejoin the Family Guy cast during the show's 12th season.
